SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SERVICE CLOUD
Email Customers

Respond to your customers using email directly from the case record page. To stay efficient, you can insert and create email templates, use quick text, and merge fields.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Essentials, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To send emails: Access Activities

Email Customers in Lightning Experience
Use the email publisher in case feed to answer customer questions and resolve customer issues.

Email Customers in Salesforce Classic
Work with email in the case feed.

Set Up a Default No-Reply Email Address
Use an org-wide system email address to send your customers automated email about their cases. To include case details and customize your email template, create a verified custom No-Reply address.

Merge Fields for Cases
The list of available email template merge fields depends on the type of data that you’re working with. Most of the merge fields for cases correspond directly with a case field.
title: Emailing Customers in Service Cloud
